Producer: Caroline Benjo, Carole Scotta, Simon Arnal
Synopsis: Three older women -- Ellen (Charlotte Rampling), a university professor from New England; Brenda (Karen Young), a housewife from Georgia; and Sue (Louise Portal), a blue-collar Canadian -- descend upon a Haitian resort in a lusty haze. Hoping to escape from dissatisfaction and loneliness, the women repeatedly hire handsome local men for casual sex. But, when Brenda begins to develop feelings for gigolo Legba (MÃ©nothy Cesar), the sudden appearance of honest emotion throws the trio into turmoil.
Title: Heading South
